description:
Fans describe us best:

"As a business person traveling different places, I use this constantly for my addresses in my GPS." - Jim Diaville

"Siri is just not doing it for me. She can never find what I need. This app does!"
 
"I just moved to a new town. This app has saved my life. I have been able to find the post office, restaurants and everything else I needed so easily.  Thank you Yellow Pages!"

“My Husband and I are very pleased that we found this app for our phones! No more trying to find a location and phone number on bogus directory apps. Thank you”

Join the millions who have fallen in love with the leader in directory apps.  The Yellow Pages app helps you find everything from business listings to movie times. It's quick and easy to use, and perfect for any situation.

Features You Will Love:

• Hands free, turn-by-turn voice navigation
• Search listings with nothing more than the sound of your voice
• Rate and review your favorite, and not-so-favorite, businesses
• See menus and make reservations within the app
• Visit business websites and see company descriptions
• Discover deals, coupons and discounts
• Browse Showtimes movie trailers, descriptions, posters, ratings and movie times
• Add business information to your contacts or “Favorites” category for quick and reliable access

If you have any feedback on how we can make this amazing app better, email us at support@avantar.com. We’d love to hear from you.
releaseNotes:
NEW - Product Search!
For over 6 years, Yellow Pages has been helping you find local businesses and retail stores. Now we are taking local search to the next level, and giving you what you really want, by showing you what is inside those retail stores with our new Product Search! Product Search lets you search the inventory of retailers like Best Buy, Dick’s Sporting Goods, eBay, Home Depot, Kmart, Lowe’s, Macy’s, Sears, Target, Toys ”R” Us, Walmart, and hundreds more, to find the products you want, and purchase them without having to go to the store!

This Black Friday, avoid the mobs of people, stay home and do your Christmas shopping from your couch using Yellow Pages Product Search!

Also in this update:
We have worked to enhance your user experience by further improving the stability and performance of the app!
